description: The course will expose students to a field of inquiry within anthropology that is close to the heart of the professional work of their professor. It will fulfil one of the advanced seminar requirements within the anthropology major of which students are required to take two.
title: Adv Topic in Anthropology
prerequisite: YCC2121 Modern Social Thought or with the permission of the instructor.
corequisite: YCC2121 Modern Social Thought or with the permission of the instructor.
